abstract: The chief executive of Bank of America, Kenneth D. Lewis, said Wednesday he remains committed to buying Countrywide Financial, the giant money-losing mortgage lender.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Bank of America, Kenneth D. Lewis, said Wednesday he remains committed to buying Countrywide Financial, the giant money-losing mortgage lender.

headline.main: BofA Chief Says He’s Committed to Coutrywide Deal
